data.message: Please can we keep the thankful reaction. It's makes FB so much more fun.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Liza! We're continuing to test different ways to bring you the most relevant experiences for the moments you care about. -Jon
Honestly if all of your reactions jumped out of the page, like the thankful reaction. All FB moments would be awesome and fun.

This was the same question I had this morning!  The thankful icon was very appreciated!  Please return it!? 
I would also love to have a "Beautiful"  and "Prayers" icon !
See Facebook. People want more out of there reactions. And you guys answered back by taking the reaction away.. Shame on you guys!!!!

Hey Facebook! 
Just want to say THANK YOU! For  keeping the "jumping out of the page reaction" feature. I'm so glad you kept that part. 
Still wish we had a thankful 🌸 and maybe a thinking 🤔 reaction, or even a sick 🤢 reaction. But your going the right direction.. and I 😍 love it.
